mapper.insert: insert into article(articleid , title , bannerid , image , contents , addtime , hits ) values(#{articleid} , #{title} , #{bannerid} , #{image} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} )
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title} , bannerid=#{bannerid} , image=#{image} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} where articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid order by articleid desc
select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid and articleid=#{articleid} order by articleid desc

and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
